title: Registry's Secrets
description: Jessica Mitchell, living the carefully constructed life that the Registry dictates, under their firm thumb and watchful eye, is starting to feel more and more like a prisoner. The only saving grace amid the endless restrictions and constant scrutiny is Craddock Daniels, the man with whom she shares this confinement.What Craddock wants most is for Jessica to be happy. Though his heart is in the right place, he attempts to accomplish this by keeping certain truths to himself. Even as these truths become undeniable, they continue to find solace in each other, clinging to the hope that their imagined future together might still be possible.But they soon learn that not everything is as it seems. It is much, much worse.On the run again, joined by old and new friends, Jessica and Craddock try to reclaim their lives… by taking on the Mengliad community’s most powerful agency.Registry’s Secrets, Book Two of The Mengliad Series
author: Jana Janeway
